title: Brooklyn Beckham leaves holiday with his arm in a sling | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Brooklyn shared a video of the moment he injured himself on Instagram. He showed impressive snowboarding ability leading up to the accident, smoothly carving through the powder in the scenic setting. After seemingly negotiating the trickiest part of the descent, he falls forwards while on an innocuous wide expanse, cracking his bone in the process. There for him: Brooklyn walked beside mum Victoria, 42, through the terminal Ouch: The 17-year-old wore his left arm in a sling after breaking his collarbone while snowboarding down the slopes in Whistler Fashionista: Victoria reverted back to a black ensemble after being snapped in a number of colourful outfits in recent weeks Back in black: She teamed an overcoat with loose-fitting trousers and black and white Adidas Superstars Rugrats or regrets? He dressed in his favoured alternative style, wearing a white beanie, a Rugrats tee and a camo jacket The video, which was viewed almost 400,000 times in the first four hours, was simply uploaded with the caption: 'Broke my collarbone at the end.' Hours later, he shared an image of his X-Ray, displaying his collarbone ripped apart, putting him out of action for the rest of the trip. Meanwhile, his father uploaded a picture of him afterwards, writing: 'Just before his accident ... Brave boy xx sorry ( man )' Victoria reverted back to a black ensemble after being snapped in a number of colourful outfits in recent weeks. Low-key: The teen covered his eyes with black shades and walked with his head down Leading the way: Brooklyn was closely followed by mum Victoria, dad David, brother Romeo and Cruz and sister Harper Doting dad: David, 41, dressed in a youthful manner, combining a bright red beanie with a green gilet, navy jumper and camo trousers Designer: Romeo, 14, draped a lavish Louis Vuitton scarf around his neck She teamed an overcoat with loose-fitting trousers and black and white Adidas Superstars. David, 41, dressed in a youthful manner, combining a bright red beanie with a green gilet, navy jumper and camo trousers. Romeo, 14, showed his style credentials by draping a lavish Louis Vuitton scarf around his neck. He wrapped up in a black quilted coat and a colourful bobble beanie to ensure he kept warm en route to the plane.
